title: Wi swrgwni Isor Afa
lyrics:
Wi swrgwni Isor Afa
Jwng khwmsini udayee subung
Nwngkhounw khaolai horw jwng
Nwngkhounw aros gabw jwng -2
(A)
Be buhumao suku-dukhu khou
Manw galangkhw nwng
Be buhumao gabnai-mininaikhou
Manw hwlangkhw nwngw -2
Sohainw haya be jiua, Usao badao selera
(B)
Be jwnwm arw be dhwrwm-a
Besen gwiya nama
Jwngnw sibinai dhwrwm-a
Thar nongthara nama -2
Bekhainw subung hariya, Thankinw haya lamakhou -2
